lead_paragraph: One of the most violent years in Chicago history ended with a sobering tally: 762 homicides, the most in two decades in the city and more than New York and Los Angeles combined.
snippet: One of the most violent years in Chicago history ended with a sobering tally: 762 homicides, the most in two decades in the city and more than New York and Los Angeles combined....

headline.main: 1 of Chicago's Bloodiest Years Ends With 762 Homicides
headline.print_headline: 1 of Chicago's Bloodiest Years Ends With 762 Homicides
